tasks.title: EPIC 1: Project Setup & Foundation
tasks.description: Initial setup of the project, including authentication and deployment.

subtasks.title: Initial SPA Scaffolding
subtasks.description: Create the initial single-page application structure.

subtasks.title: Setup Supabase Backend
subtasks.description: Initialize a new Supabase project for backend services.

subtasks.title: Implement User Authentication
subtasks.description: Connect the frontend to Supabase Auth to handle user sign-up, sign-in, and session management.

subtasks.title: Deploy to Vercel
subtasks.description: Connect the GitHub repository to Vercel for continuous deployment.

tasks.title: EPIC 2: Phase 1 - MVP Core Typing Experience
tasks.description: Build the essential features for a user to practice typing and see their results.

subtasks.title: Design Core Database Schema
subtasks.description: Create the initial tables in Supabase to store user data, lessons, and results.

subtasks.title: Build Typing Interface Component
subtasks.description: Create the main React component where the user performs the typing test.

subtasks.title: Implement WPM & Accuracy Logic
subtasks.description: Add the client-side logic to calculate Words Per Minute and accuracy.

subtasks.title: Save Lesson Results
subtasks.description: Create the function to persist the user's results to the database.

subtasks.title: Create User Dashboard Page
subtasks.description: Build a page where users can see their progress and stats.

tasks.title: EPIC 3: Phase 2 - Content & Engagement
tasks.description: Expand the platform with more content, gamification, and engaging features.

subtasks.title: Generate Australian Curriculum Content
subtasks.description: Create a rich set of Australian-themed typing lessons.

subtasks.title: Create Curriculum Seeding Script
subtasks.description: Write a script to upload the generated lesson content into the Supabase database.

subtasks.title: Design & Build Typing Game
subtasks.description: Create the first interactive typing game to make practice more fun.

subtasks.title: Design Achievement System
subtasks.description: Conceptualize a system of badges and achievements to motivate users.

subtasks.title: Implement Achievement System Backend
subtasks.description: Build the backend logic to track and award achievements.

tasks.title: EPIC 4: UI/UX & Design Refinement
tasks.description: Polish the application's look and feel, ensuring a high-quality, accessible, and enjoyable user experience.

subtasks.title: Review and Refine Colour Palette
subtasks.description: Ensure the colours are accessible and aesthetically pleasing.

subtasks.title: Create UI Component Library
subtasks.description: Standardize all UI elements like buttons, inputs, and modals into a reusable component library.

subtasks.title: Add Page Transitions and Animations
subtasks.description: Implement smooth animations to make the user experience more fluid and engaging.

tasks.title: EPIC 5: Feature Expansion & Content Pages
tasks.description: Build out the remaining key pages of the application to provide a complete user experience.

subtasks.title: Build Lessons Page
subtasks.description: Create a page that lists all available lessons, grouped by difficulty.

subtasks.title: Build Progress Page
subtasks.description: Create a detailed progress page with charts and statistics.

subtasks.title: Build User Profile & Settings Pages
subtasks.description: Allow users to view their profile and update their settings.

subtasks.title: Build Static About Page
subtasks.description: Create a simple, static 'About' page explaining the project's mission.

tasks.title: EPIC 6: Pre-Launch Finalisation
tasks.description: Perform final checks and balances before considering the project 'Version 1.0'.

subtasks.title: Conduct Cross-Browser & Mobile Testing
subtasks.description: Ensure the application works and looks great on all major browsers and mobile devices.

subtasks.title: Implement User Feedback
subtasks.description: Ask a few friends to test the site and provide feedback on their experience.

subtasks.title: Final Code Cleanup & Refactor
subtasks.description: Perform a final pass on the codebase to ensure it's clean and maintainable.

metadata.description: Task list for the Typing Galah project, designed for an AI-assisted workflow. Includes complete history.
